EmailTemplate.name: Azure_Cold_Nurture.Azure_Cold_Nurture_Email_4
EmailTemplate.subject: Continuous Optimization in the Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/windows-server-sql-server-2008-eos?utm_id=70157000001bY5vAAE]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Microsoft support for SQL Server 2008 and 2008 R2 will end on July 9, 2019. Now is the time to prepare for that deadline.
As a top Microsoft Partner for assessments, migration, and optimizations, Turbonomic workload automation ensures a frictionless migration to Azure for Windows and SQL Servers. Watch our on-demand webinar <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/windows-server-sql-server-2008-eos?utm_id=70157000001bY5vAAE]]> to see what 7 Days to Azure can do for you.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/windows-server-sql-server-2008-eos?utm_id=70157000001bY5vAAE]]>
Join us as we discuss how a Big 4 Accounting Firm leverages Turbonomic to assess and migrate workloads to Azure and once in Azure optimize their entire hybrid estate. If you have any additional questions about how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time, please feel free to schedule a meeting with us <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo?utm_id=70157000001bY5vAAE]]>.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
